scripts.start: concurrently --names "DOCKER,FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix "[{name}]" "npm run start-system" "npm run start-frontend" "npm run start-backend"
scripts.start-full: concurrently --names "DOCKER,FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix "[{name}]" "npm run start-system-full" "npm run start-frontend" "npm run start-backend"
